--------------------------------------------
in dims 2 and 3, A and B incomp allows p_1AB < p_1B, but if A and B comp then not possible (just a quirk of the 2 and 3 dims)
State: 892
ProbVector([0.60548591 0.39451409])
ProbVector([0.64647893 0.18957815 0.16394291])
ProbVector([6.18438445e-01 2.57144336e-01 8.53068769e-02 2.08734808e-02
 1.82215905e-02 1.52715863e-05])





Counterexample for E^+:

p = ProbVector([0.5038194 0.4961806])
q = ProbVector([0.57078751 0.26541101 0.16380148])
p meet q = ProbVector([0.5038194  0.33237912 0.16380148])
p join q = ProbVector([0.57078751 0.42921249 0.        ])
d(p, p meet q) = 0.3147109454214858 nats
d(p, q) = 0.2953915536560283 nats
H(p) = 0.6931180046381571 nats
H(q) = 0.9684569266389668 nats
H(p meet q) = 1.007828950059643 nats
H(p join q) = 0.6830916888105477 nats
